page.title: 06EDUCATION THE PRIVETT CENTRE
page.content: The old school together with the attractive school house has been refurbished and renamed the "Privett Centre". Here, children of all ages from the Basingstoke town area experience a complete change of environment. They study the countryside and farming with the co-operation of local farmers. Sometimes they come to the Centre just for a few days' quiet private study. The Centre can accommodate up to 18 children and staff for periods of up to a week. They are encouraged to do their own catering and the special mini-bus in which they arrive is at their service for sight-seeing. The Centre also serves as a holiday home for severely physically and mentally handicapped children who come for short breaks accompanied by volunteer schoolchildren to assist the staff.
